<https://mandrillapp.com/track/click/30773215/www.loom.com?>                                 Hi Shawn,
Great news! Your Loom profile has been successfully migrated to Atlassian.
   As part of this new integration, we've logged you out of Loom. Simply
log back in with your existing credentials to pick up right where you left
off.      What this means for you          •   *All your videos and
workspaces are safe* — nothing has been moved or lost            •
*Same login, new destination* — use your existing credentials to sign in
through Atlassian            •   *Better integrations ahead* — this is
just the first step toward seamless access to Confluence, Jira, and the
full Atlassian suite               Questions? Check out our support
article
<https://mandrillapp.com/track/click/30773215/support.atlassian.com?>
